column4: does anyone know what role the metacity process plays, verses Xorg?  where does the actual window rendering happen?
try looking metacity and xwindows in wikipedia , the defs are pretty decent
sudo cp
just pluggin it in should automount it , or maybe you need to put a cd in for it to mount
i need to run a LiveCD from it
it boots the liveCD, but eventually it wants to configure the CD Drive
I don't understand why, it works enough to get it to that point
ah ,  I donT' know about that ,  try checking in the forum
what is your videocard ?
via unichrome pro onboard
errrr.....
you think it might be the drivers?
try menu > system > admin > restricted drivers see if one is available, if not play around with the settings in system > prefs> fonts
in the font dialog box you can play aournd with the subpixel order in the details screen
you need to copy the url and use the stand alone mplayer to view it,   and the video isnT' worth it,  just a line of wave on a lake
yeah, i figured it's probably a dumb vid, but i have had this problem before
streaming from tv network sites never seem to work well from me in the browser
i stopped it, then tried playing again and then it worked for some reason.  but at first, it looked like it kept starting over loading the file every 2 seconds
that's pretty much what I get with those kinds of stream
you also need the -pluggin package
in backport ,  make sure it is enalbed,   just search for java and browse until you find the -plugin one
backport? what is that?

one of the repos,  close synaptic,  open  Menu > system > admin > software sources,  check all the boxes on the first tab and all the boxes on the third tab as well , reload,   open synaptic and search
